quests.desc: Your objective is to take the burger from the mantle inside the study.
commands: unlock rectangular portal with rectangular latchkey
unlock spherical door with spherical latchkey
unlock rectangular portal with rectangular latchkey
unlock spherical door with spherical latchkey

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a vault. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 You can make out a counter. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on. The counter is normal.[if there is something on the s_0] On the counter you make out [a list of things on the s_0], so there's that.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] The counter appears to be empty.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] spherical door leading south. There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] rectangular portal leading west.

infos.name: cookery
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a cookery. You begin looking for stuff.

 You can see a pan. [if there is something on the s_1]On the pan you see [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if]

 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] rectangular portal leading east. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading north.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
You're now in a kitchen.

 You can see a saucepan. The saucepan is typical.[if there is something on the s_2] On the saucepan you make out [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] spherical door leading north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a dish-pit. A normal one.

 You see a chair. The chair is usual.[if there is something on the s_3] On the chair you see [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Sometimes, just sometimes, TextWorld can just be the worst.[end if] You can see a bowl. The bowl is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_4] On the bowl you make out [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You arrive in a basement. An usual kind of place.

 [if c_0 is locked]A locked[else if c_0 is open]An open[otherwise]A closed[end if] safe is close by.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a workbench. The workbench is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_5] On the workbench you can make out [a list of things on the s_5]. Hmmm... what else, what else?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] However, the workbench, like an empty workbench, has nothing on it.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You find yourself in an office. An usual kind of place.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You arrive in a chamber. A normal kind of place. Let's see what's in here.

 Look over there! a desk. [if there is something on the s_6]You see [a list of things on the s_6] on the desk.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash.[end if] Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a bed. The bed is standard.[if there is something on the s_7] On the bed you make out [a list of things on the s_7].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You arrive in a bedroom. An ordinary one. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'

 You make out [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] portmanteau.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The portmanteau contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The portmanteau is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You're now in the cubicle. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the bedchamber.

 Were you looking for a bookshelf? Because look over there, it's a bookshelf. The bookshelf is typical.[if there is something on the s_8] On the bookshelf you see [a list of things on the s_8].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8] But there isn't a thing on it. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You are in a studio. A normal kind of place.



You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You've entered a study.

 Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a box. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The box contains [a list of things in the c_2]. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on.[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The box is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You see a mantle. [if there is something on the s_9]On the mantle you see [a list of things on the s_9].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9]But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a bar. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading west. There is an unguarded exit to the east.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
You arrive in a sauna. A typical kind of place. You begin looking for stuff.

 You see [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] normal looking trunk right there by you.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_3]. Hmmm... what else, what else?[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The trunk is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading east. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading south.

infos.name: laundromat
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a laundromat. A standard kind of place. Let's see what's in here.

 You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a shelf. What a coincidence, weren't you just thinking about a shelf? The shelf is usual.[if there is something on the s_10] On the shelf you make out [a list of things on the s_10].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_10] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. What's the point of an empty shelf?[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
You are in an attic. A normal kind of place. You can barely contain your excitement.

 Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a crate.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The crate contains [a list of things in the c_4]. The light flickers for a second, but nothing else happens.[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You make out a rack. The rack is typical.[if there is something on the s_11] On the rack you can make out [a list of things on the s_11].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_11] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash.[end if] Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a stand. [if there is something on the s_12]You see [a list of things on the s_12] on the stand. Now that's what I call TextWorld![end if][if there is nothing on the s_12]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the south. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: workshop

This just in- You, in the workshop. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

There is an unblocked exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
You make a grand eccentric entrance into a spare room.

 If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a table. [if there is something on the s_13]You see [a list of things on the s_13] on the table.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_13]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: austere cubicle
infos.desc:
You've moved into an austere room. Your mind races to think of what kind of room would be austere. And then it hits you. Of course. You're in the austere cubicle. You begin to take stock of what's here.

 Hey, want to see a mantelpiece? Look over there, a mantelpiece. You wonder idly who left that here. The mantelpiece is normal.[if there is something on the s_14] On the mantelpiece you can make out [a list of things on the s_14].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_14] But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

unlock spherical door with spherical latchkey

objective: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! Your task for today is to take the burger from the mantle.
